description.en: Döbeln sits half-upright in his sickbed, gesturing firmly toward an aide who stands beside a table in the dim candlelit room.

narration.en: Though weakened, Döbeln’s resolve hardens; the fate of Jutas will not be decided without his direction.

info: Composition based on attached historical artwork; includes Döbeln and a single aide as permitted by the storyboard.
